message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I get $6000 and you get $4000.  Think about the inflation!
Considering the inflation, I think this is a more reasonable split.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats up even more of the pie!
You're right, inflation is eating up the pie, but I think I deserve a bigger slice.
Bob, let's stop this. I'm offering a 50/50 split. It's the most logical option considering the circumstances.  Any more delays and the inflation will make the whole thing pointless.
